description: Returns the list of resource policies in the target Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicies
nested_items.description: The list of resource policies in the target Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: PolicyName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource policy. Must be unique within a specific Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: PolicyDocument
nested_items.description: The resource policy document, which can be up to 5kb in size.

nested_items.name: PolicyRevisionId
nested_items.description: Returns the current policy revision id for this policy name.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: When the policy was last updated, in Unix time seconds.
